name: Kimeramon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may place 1 level 5 or lower Digimon card from your trash under this Digimon as its bottom digivolution card. Then, up to 4 of your opponent's Digimon get -1000 DP for each of this Digimon's colors until the end of your opponent's next turn.[Your Turn] This Digimon is treated as also having the colors of its digivolution cards. While this Digimon has 4 or more colors, it gets +4000 DP.
